org.apache.ambari.server.credentialapi

Class CredentialUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.ambari.server.credentialapi.CredentialUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    public class CredentialUtil
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    Command line utility that wraps over CredentialShell. Extends the create command to overwrite a credential if it exists. Also provides the ability to get the decrypted password. The CLI structure and code is the same as CredentialShell.
